DOC.brief_summary: The efficacy of risedronate in prevention of bone loss in patients receiving high dose corticosteroid treatment
DOC.brief_title: The Efficacy of Risedronate in Prevention of Bone Loss in Patients Receiving High Dose Corticosteroid Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: We compare the effect of risedronate with placebo in bone mineral density changes in patients receiving high dose corticosteroids for their underlying diseases
DOC.criteria: 1. Patients with various medical conditions who require high dose glucocorticoid treatment: (1) pulse methylprednisolone; (2) oral prednisolone (>=0.8mg/kg/day) or equivalent for at least 6 weeks. 2. Age>=18 years and <75 years. 1. Pregnant or lactating women. 2. Uncorrected hypocalcemia. 3. History of esophageal stricture. 4. Previous intolerance or hypersenstivity to biphosphonates.
